errors.IMAGENOTFOUND: Image not found or already associated with another question
errors.ALREADYATTOP: This question is already at the top
errors.ALREADYATBOTTOM: This question is already at the bottom
errors.USERRESPONSENOTALLOWED: User is not allowed to respond to the survey
errors.RESPONSELIMITEXCEEDED: 'closeOnResponseLimit' is enabled but 'limit' is not set or invalid in group '{{key}}'.
errors.SURVEYNOTYETRELEASED: Survey is scheduled to release on {{date}} and cannot be accessed yet in group '{{key}}'.
errors.RELEASEONDATEWITHOUTDATE: 'releaseOnDate' is enabled but no 'date' is specified in group '{{key}}'.
errors.SURVEYCLOSED: Survey was closed on {{date}} and is no longer accessible in group '{{key}}'.
errors.CLOSEONDATEWITHOUTDATE: 'closeOnDate' is enabled but no 'date' is specified in group '{{key}}'.
errors.QUESTIONREQUIRESSELECTION: Question ID {{questionId}} requires at least one selection.
errors.QUESTIONREQUIRESINPUTTEXT: Question ID {{questionId}} requires an input text.
errors.QUESTIONREQUIRESRATINGVALUE: Question ID {{questionId}} requires a rating value.
errors.INVALIDRATINGVALUE: Question ID {{questionId}} has an invalid rating value.
errors.SURVEYNOTFOUNDFORTHISBUSINESS: Survey not found for this business
errors.ANSWEROPTIONSMUSTBEGREATERTHANTWO: Answer options must be greater than 2
